define.name: nof_mpls_push_profiles
define.doc: JR mode Number of MPLS Push Profiles

define.name: nof_bits_mpls_label
define.doc: Specifies number of bits used to represent an MPLS label

define.name: log_nof_mpls_range_elements
define.doc: Specifies number of bits used to represent number of available elements on any of mpls-range tables

define.name: nof_mpls_range_elements
define.doc: Specifies number of available elements on any of mpls-range tables

define.name: mpls_special_label_encap_handling
define.doc: Indicates whether special labels should be handled separatly

define.name: mpls_control_word_supported
define.doc: Indicates whether control word non-zero values supported.
